I bought the mint chocolate and banana coconut to use in shakes.  They both were very delicious.  Shipping was quick, ordered on the 23rd and received on the 26th.
We love the flavour but I am only getting 1/2 a cup of coffee.  We can't figure out why that is.

Summary: Good drink, something different to try rather than the usual soft drinks
Text:
These drinks are pretty good. Nice to have something different to drink rather than the usual soft drinks filled with sugar and syrup. This one is also more refreshing than soft drinks, and a little more interesting than just regular fruit juices.

Everyone's tastes are different, but in my opinion they are surely at least worth a try!

This has proven to be excellent catnip. The cats can't resist it and one of them gulps it down and then lays there and trips out and plays for a little while. Most certainly will buy some more of it when this can is done. Not sure the kitties would settle for anything else at this point. They love this stuff.

Summary: The perfect snack or side dish.
Text:
This is one of my grandson's favorite Happy Baby flavor. Perfect for dipping his pancake pieces in. Great with chicken and turkey. An excellent way to make sure he gets his veggies. An added bonus: Salba, a strain of chia seed that is super nutritious - lots of omega 3s, fiber, protein and antioxidents.
Only Happy Baby adds special ingredients like this.Happy Baby HAPPYTOT BUTTERNUT SQUASH & APPLE organic super food for kids 4.22 oz

My malti-poo will not eat these.  I tried and tried to coax him into eating this product, and finally he would take the little bones and go hide them in the couch. However he loves the "talk to me" minty treats.
I LOVE the Blue Sky Wild Raspberry but I cannot stand the Black Cherry.  It doesn't have much flavor and it has an awful aftertaste.  UGH!

Switch promises "A perfect balance between juice and carbonation" and it does live up to that as it delivers a fresh burst of stawberry and kiwi (the kiwi could have been a little stronger) and less carbonation then your regular sodas. And it is a bonus that it is 100% Juice with no sugar added and no preservatives

My main drawback is the can as the tall thin can is a little too small and regular soda cans that are shorter and thicker and stream out better than the taller, thinner ones like Switch.
VERY good broth. I took a pouch for my mom to try and she couldn't get over how much it tasted like how her mom's chicken soup broth... I bought this without tasting it first and am very pleased.

I try not to each a lot of processed food, but occasionally I indulge. These are the very best cheese crunchies and gluten free too! I have found these at New Seasons in Portland Oregon every once in a while, but wish they were more readily available. Very good!!!!

Summary: They way to buy food coloring ...
Text: This definitely is the way to buy food coloring ... forget about those tiny little bottles at the grocery store! We love the quality of this Durkee food coloring, and we love the fact that it is bottled in 16-ounce containers. We always us it in red velvet cake, and it doesn't break the bank. The coloring is rich and works very, very well. Highly recommended ...

These are a delicious guilt free snack that I always have handy. They are so convenient and last a long time. I also get the corn and mixed veggies which are also wonderful. You can get them at Whole Foods but not at this price.
Diabetics know the health benefits of cinnamon. This delicious product allows us to enjoy cinnamon without dangerous sugar.
This is a great stand-in when you can't make it out to Starbucks.  Love having an instant version at home.  Love, love, love it.

These cookies are just wonderful!!! The chocolate is deep, dark, rich and melts very nicely in your mouth.  I would say that it is a bittersweet chocolate and very finely made. These cookies give the chocolate lover a satisfying chocolate experience. Do not hesitate to buy them!
This has been a favorite for years I can only drink decaf and its hard to find flavors. I like that I can get it in bulk

Summary: Seven days of bad taste in your mouth
Text:
The ghastly horror of these pickles is enough to strip the mind of reason. They are brown, mushy, and flavored with spices that bring to mind the morgue and the taxidermist. On top of that each and every pickled chunk is sweetened with a full tablespoon of pure cane sugar.

No living human being could consume more than one without selling his immortal soul.

I agree with some of the other reviewers. I have been buying this product, mostly to add to coffee, for several years. At some point, I noticed that the flavor changed, and (to my palate at least), it was a change for the worse. After noticing some of the recent reviews, I made sure to order the "Classic" flavor when my supply started to run low. When it arrived, I taste-tested vs. the "non-Classic?" that I still had on hand, and (again, to my palate), the "Classic" tasted far superior. I suppose other people may prefer the new flavor, but for me, the Classic is the one I'll order from now on.

One night, I was looking quickly for a tomato sauce for my pasta. My very restricted diet [intolerances to multiple foods], made any night hard.
I scurried next door to my grandparent's home and found this product. Ever since discovering this brand, it has continued to be a favorite!
I enjoy this drink every morning before going to work. And my little child loves it so much. This is a rich chocolate drink.
This product came sooner than was estimated and was exactly what I needed for my wedding reception.
My kids and I loved this peanut butter! Although the other review had us laughing, we disagree and will be buying more of this peanut butter....no mouthwash needed!

Summary: I too want the SUGAR FREE Cafe Vienna BACK PLEASE!
Text: I love the CAFE VIENNA...the regular is great...but the SUGAR FREE is my favorite.  I cannot find it anywhere...and when looking on-line it doesn't look like they are making it anymore.  I agree with the other reviewer who said that I imagine most all of these type of drinks tend to be purchased and drunk more by women than men...and women tend to want the sugar free varieties of these indulgences!  I just found a long lost can stuck in my closet at work and it made my day!  It is also difficult to even find the Cafe Vienna regular in the stores.  Only the Suisse Mocha and French vanilla are available sugar free...and they are both thick, heavy and TOO SWEET.  Please bring back a range of sugar free varieties...at least on-line ... such as the Chai latte, Orange Caffe, Cafe Vienna of course, and how about that PUMPKIN Spice TOO!

Summary: If you like your cashews oily, you may love these -.
Text:
I have purchased a lot of cashews from Amazon but this was my first experience with this brand. I was very happy with the nuts I had been getting and I tried this one for just two reasons: [1] The brands I usually order were out of stock and [2] among the the reasonably priced cashews, this one had the best reviews. I note that one review did say they were very oily but, in the end, that reviewer gave the product a 5 star rating. Well, that reviewer was certainly correct about one thing: these nuts are very oily. The walls of the package were so oil coated that I could barely see the nuts inside. My immediate reaction was to contact Amazon for a return label. But the site said food products were not returnable. I decided to call because I thought that there was significant misrepresentation of the product and that they would make an exception for that. Then I discovered that Amazon no longer takes phone calls to Customer Service!!! While I am surprised and a bit unhappy that Amazon has cut off calls to Customer Service, their "no return policy" on foods bothers me even more because the result is that anyone who calls their product a food gets a free pass on the requirement for an accurate description of the item. In the case of these cashews, the picture in the product description shows the nuts inside the container very clearly, whereas they are barely visible through the oil film on the inside of the package.
Well, I decided to try to make the best of it, so I emptied the nuts onto paper towels, as the reviewer mentioned above had done. and dried them off as well as I could. Unfortunately, the remaining oil had an old taste that was definitely not pleasant.
I have rated this product at 2 stars just because I have not tried all the cashew brands at Amazon and there may well be some that are still worse.
In fairness to Emerald Harmony, these are the only oil roasted cashews I have purchased.[Oil is not mentioned by them and most other brands are dry roasted]
And in fairness to Amazon, I want to say that this is the only product I have purchased from them where i have been unhappy with the final outcome.

Despite dented cans and preservatives, this is a decent buy. Connect with Customer Service regarding the dented cans and you can work something out. Growing up in a household with some family members having milk allergies, coconut milk was always around. Cinnamon Raisin Oatmeal with coconut milk was heavenly growing up as was my Grandmother's coconut "ice cream". As I strive to eat healthier this was an alternative BUT the pesky preservatives didn't get me there with this one.

I enjoy this anyway and would buy it again :)

I love this mousse and have been using it for years.  I am a person that can't leave well enough alone when it comes to directions or recipes. For instance I feel that if you make this according to their directions you get sort of a pudding consistency rather than mousse. I use about half of the milk, making it very thick, then I FOLD in some Cool Whip OR stiffly whipped whipping cream.  You get the sugar with the Cool Whip, but not much.  With the whipping cream you get the fat but no sugar and no carbs. I sweeten it lightly with some Splenda.  Now if you really want to add some luciousness, cut the milk by about a 1/4 C. and add 1/4 C. Coffee Liqueur when you are mixing it all up.  You can adjust to your own taste, but remember it is liquid, so subtract the milk for how much liqueur you add. Beat like crazy! Then FOLD in the cream. Once the mouse is done to your favored consistency, set aside. Take some Nabisco or any other chocolate wafers and into an 8X10 or 8X8 baking dish add one layer of the wafers and then scoop some of the mousse on top of that and smooth. Repeat until you end with at the top with mousse. Cover and refig for several hours (6-or how ever many you can stand, longeer the better) and then cut into pieces. Oh Man is this good! Any questions contact me at vegasdi1@cox.net
These were great! They arrived in good shape (no melting) and tasted fine (no stale taste or dried-out "white" spots). The only problem I had with them was that I could not stop eating them!

Summary: my cats turned their nose up
Text: Neither of my seafood loving cats liked this at all. It looked very dry, and both my cats love the juices to be plentiful in their half of  one can of wet food a day.  Both cats are crazy, crazy, crazy for an occasional real tuna treat, so i thougt this would be a sure  thing.  Two weeks after I got it I brought home two 12 week old kittens I decided to adopt, and they gave it a sniff, and walked away. Not even  my neighbor who I gave it to for feeding strays could get it eaten. This leads me to believe it wasn't a good  batch~ but the date was fine~ 2013 and the end of it, too. Disappointing for me since i had been looking for a cat food that was tuna and good for the cats, but this isn't it.

I sent this candy gift box to my very best friend who will be turning 60 tomorrow.  She just called and can't stop raving about all the candy and how great everything is.  I haven't seen it in person, but from her reaction, I would say she loves it.

Summary: Strong with Italian/French roast flavors and aromas
Text: Decent, strong cup with overtones of Italian or French roasts.  CP Organic Bold is a bit "rounder" and Jet Fuel is a tad bitter.  Produces a nice cup of reasonably strong coffee that is not bitter or harsh.  Our prefs run to CP Organic and Green Mountain Dark Magic or Double Black Diamond and the occasional Italian or French Roast.  We find the Timothy's blends to be rather bitter.  With the bulk packaging and subscription, Coffee People produce the least expensive K cups we have found at around 35 cents per pod.

Summary: Not for my dog with copper storage syndrome
Text: I purchased this product because it advertised that it contained zinc and it does. My dog is on zinc maintainance because he has copper storage disease. When I read the ingredients I found an ingredient that would be harmful to him. The packages were never opened and returned with no questions asked. The delivery was fast and the customer service was courteous. I only give it 2 stars because I never used the product.

I originally purchased these caffeinated mints for a 13-hour driving trip. They taste more minty than chocolaty. While driving I need to take three at once in order to feel a slight kick later on. They have found another use on campus for not-so-interesting classes. For that situation one keeps me entertained enough to not doze off just because I become focused on eating something.

Overall I do not find these to be effective enough to justify another purchase.
The tea is delicious and came very quickly, which was good, because I was completely out.  :)  Will order again when Keurig.com has no stock.
Love the taste.  I don't care about the foam (or lack thereof). If you're a regular coffee drinker, this is pretty darn tasty.  I made sure to ask for some more for Christmas.

I was very pleased when I got an email from this retailer advising me of the potential problem with my order that I had not even considered.  The problem was the unbearable heat that the East coast was suffering. She was afraid that my order,which was chocolate, would melt if not accepted right away. She even upgraded my shipping  and packed the product in frozen gel packs, and planned the ship date to assure that it wouldn't sit in a warehouse over the weekend! I was so grateful and so pleased with the customer service (esp on a small order)I will definately use them again! The product was chocolate rocks. My Nieces and nephews love them! They came fresh, and unmelted!  The kids loved them, and I am still the favorite Aunt!!
No doubt that this is the best true vanilla that you can buy today...but the bargain price I found here on Amazon was astounding!  So much cheaper than directly from a dealer!

Stash Chamomile Herbal Tea is tea bags with dried, crushed chamomile flowers.

Honestly, as far as I'm concerned, chamomile is chamomile. I suppose that when you use loose flowers you get sediment in the cup and I have seen this happen with some brands of chamomile tea bags, these don't do that.

I have also had organic chamomile (this isn't) but I can't taste the difference.

Each bag is individually packaged and that is either good or bad depending on how and where you use it and if you are concerned about excessive packaging.

If you like chamomile tea, this is a good choice.

Funny reviewing something so basic, but this jasmine rice is great! The bags are a good size, last quite a while. I use this rice in my cheapie rice cooker and it turns out perfect. I don't bother rinsing it beforehand because 1. I'm lazy and 2. always seem to end up wasting rice because it falls into the sink! Because I don't rinse it, it sticks a little but the best way to avoid that I've found is to let the rice sit in the cooker for a few minutes after the timer goes off. I think the steam from the pot loosens whatever is stuck to the bottom. :)

Anyway yes - basic, but delicious rice. We recently ran out of it and had to resort to using that plain, long grain white rice from the store. Blegh. Much much much prefer this jasmine rice! Recommended! :)

Firstly, I am picky with water. I do not like Aquafina or Dasani because I think they taste like the plastic bottle. My favorite waters are Deer Park and Poland Spring. Both have a clean, crisp flavor, with no funky after taste or odd plastic taste.

Essentia has a nice clean, fresh taste. Just pure clean water. No after taste, no odd tastes overall. I love the bigger sized bottle. I cannot attest to the benefits of drinking pH water specifically because I only tried the one bottle and of course did not see any benefits or notice anything spectacularly different from any other water.

I suppose if you have great interest in the long term benefits of drinking Essentia with its 9.5pH and if you do not mind the price, it is worth it. I myself cannot see spending so much on bottled water, although it does have a very good, pure taste.

I really like it when my wife makes anything from her Betty Crocker cookbook, so I know when we got the gluten free pancakes that they would be good. They are not overly dry like some of the other brands of gluten free pancakes.

We usually have them with earth balance butter spread, and sliced bananas or sliced strawberries, chopped pecans or walnuts and maple syrup. They are great.

Summary: Mushy and greasy... tastes like pepperoni
Text: wild ride 1.25 oz hot and spicy. Not good, not good at all the title says it all.

Summary: Delicious and super easy soup mix
Text: For a boxed dry mix, this soup is wonderful. The first time I made it, I was actually startled by the incredible aroma when I opened the package; it smelled delicious. It's super easy, too, as you simply add it to water and simmer for a while. As they note on the box, it's especially yummy if you sprinkle some bacon bits and shredded chedder on top before you serve it. Add a couple of slices of homemade bread and a green salad and you have dinner.

Summary: I grew up drinking Nestea Instant Unsweetened
Text: I've had the hardest time finding Nestea instant tea that's not sweetened and no lemon. I grew up drinking plain ice tea, with nothing in it except ice. In the past several years, it's been getting harder and harder to find Instant Nestea with nothing in it. All our local stores stopped carrying it. Fortunately, Amazon still carries it. I just received my order with six jars !! I'm happy now :does happy dance::
I use to buy garlic.from the New Orleans Market.  They did not make it after Katrina. This is equally as .good and a fraction of what you pay at the local grocery.

Love this coffee!! We've tried quite a few & this is great everyday one! Vendor is good, we got them quickly after placing order! Great box packs of 24 for 120 purchase! Box has perforation so you can use it as dispenser!

I needed alum for dyeing my hand spun wool with natural colors. I got the package delivered at home fine and on time, but only then realized that I got aluminium sulfate (Al2(SO4)3), instead of potassium aluminium sulfate ( KAl(SO4)2.12H2O). Those two have very different properties, and I cannot use aluminium sulphate in dyeing, because it does not open wool fibers as potassium aluminium sulphate does. According to Wikipedia, this is a common misnomer. Adding the chemical formula would have helped me a great deal and saved time. The package I was delivered did not have the chemical formula on it, it only had the name aluminium sulphate on it. Also, the chemical formula was not mentioned on the website at all. Proper naming would have made my life a lot easier.
The product itself was in very good condition when it arrived at home, and I was impressed how well it was packaged.
I bought this as a birthday present for my boss, since she is a child of the 70's. She had a lot of fun talking about memories that the candy brought back. Big hit. Great product.

I ordered this flavor of Big Train (the product the coffee shops use) because I wanted more at a time. Unfortunately, it was only about 3/4's full, and did not, to me, taste like vanilla. Oddly enough, the smell reminds me of apples. ;^)
I am going back to buying the chocolate pouches of Big Train Chai.Big Train Chocolate Chai Mix, 12-Ounce Bags (Pack of 3)
This seemed a little bland to me I have been just trying to use it up in things that have better flavor to start with

I had to quit coffee cold turkey due to PCOS, and this tea is getting me through it.  It is recommended for females who have PCOS to drink approximately 6 cups a day for full benefits.  I was able to do just that with the Stash-Amazon subscription program.  I love it with a little non dairy creamer and sweet-n-low.  It has a wonderful aroma.  when you open the individual tea package, you can swell the wonderful peppermint aroma.  The other great thing is that Stash actually recommends that you double steep their bags (3-5 minutes).  I did at first, but I no longer do, I want a fresh bag every time. This is some great tea, and everyone who is around me when I drink it; always asks me what is that, it smells so good. I have went to other stores and tried to buy variations of peppermint / mint teas, and none of them even come close in comparrison to this tea.  it is a must buy!

I had been able to purchase the Baking chips locally for some time. However, the local supermarkets for some reason quit carrying them. I had tried a different brand, but was VERY disappointed with the taste in the cookies. I googled the product and found that it was available on Amazon and was even more surprised with the pricing. I can now give my neighbors the great tasting White Chocolate Macadamia cookies.

My husband and I were looking for a good snack and these fit the bill for us. More fiber than your normal pretzel, lots of flavor and has a decent amount of protein too. These are terrific! Its been part of our diet for over a year and we have lost about 60 pounds each. We make our own hummus and eat these with it, or I eat them with a wedge of laughing cow cheese or peanut butter.

Most people have had these at sometime in their life so no need to tell you how good they are. Only problem is - when getting this quantity it is hard not to eat them continuously!  Too bad the calories can't be quartered :)

I have been a big fan of Amazon for a long time now, and I buy A LOT of stuff from them. One item I have purchased almost monthly over the past year is the "think Thin" Brownie Crunch protein bar. That all ended this month. When I attempted to place my order, I was not allowed to complete my purchase. The message I received read: " We are sorry. This item has limited purchase quantity. Because you have purchased the maximum allowable quantity in the past you cannot buy any more units of this item." Wow! It is hard to imagine a purchase limit on protein bars, but apparently there is one, although I have yet to find that information on the site. What makes this an even more ridiculous proposition is the fact that there is a subscription option that allows one to receive "think Thin" bars monthly on an auto-ship program for, I presume, perpetuity if one so chooses. I would be fine with signing up for a subscription, but Amazon won't let me do that either for the same reason. Apparently Amazon customer service does not share my sense of irony when I pointed out the subscription option, and they simply repeated: "It is a limited item. Sorry for the inconvenience."

I have been very happy with Amazon's service up until today. Maybe it is because I have high expectations based on my many, many previous transactions, or maybe it is because my wholly unsatisfying interaction with Amazon customer service, but this episode leaves a very bitter taste in my mouth. Although I will likely continue to purchase from Amazon, I believe I will make it a point to patronize my local merchants whenever possible before I consider another Amazon purchase.

I love this "think Thin" product, but buyers beware of Amazon's policy.

Summary: Great Mid-Value Treat for Your Dog!
Text:
I've been feeding Soft and Chewy Buddy Biscuits to my three dogs for years. They're great because they break apart easily, so you can give them whole or break them down for training or to fit appropriately in interactive toys.

Some dogs may not be thrilled about the lamb flavor as much as other Buddy Biscuit flavors (our three dogs seem to favor the Beef and Grilled Chicken), but I've never seen a happy dog turn them down.

I note these as a "mid-value" treat because I've tried using these as a high value treat for a fearful dog, and they just didn't cut it. It's not surprising, as high value usually needs to be something like cheese or meat, but I did want to make the distinction.

That doesn't mean they wouldn't be high value for your dog (every dog is different), but they do not work for us.

They are not "mid-value" as in quality. They are high quality treats, with good ingredients, made in the United States. We currently buy every flavor we can on Amazon through Subscribe and Save, if that says anything about how we feel about them.

I have noooo idea what the "blech" titled review is about. My bag is not spicy at all, and the chips definitely don't taste bad. They were not too crunchy either. In fact they are almost plain regular chips. No big pizzaz here. I was sad about that.

I was actually really hoping for something limey! And Spicy! But don't expect that here. I've almost gone through a whole bag, and maybe 1% of the bites have a hint of lime? Zero bites have had a hint of chili. 99% taste like regular unflavored tortilla chips. Well...a suuupppper small hint of flavor. I'm almost wishing I had bought the pico de gallo instead.

Basically, if you've been eating any chili-lemon flavored cheetos, completely wipe your memory and expectations- nothing that bold and tangy here. (Which can be good and bad, my hubby hated the cheetos chili-lemon unspicy flavor and was worried we'd get that here, so he's happy we didn't. I was looking forward to getting that popping taste, and am sad that wasn't there.)

** WARNING: If you've never ordered full size bag of chips from amazon, be warned, 12 bags is A LOT!!! I opened the box and my jaw almost dropped, cause I don't know what I'm going to do with all the bags. I'm sure they'll disappear at parties though. (I had ordered mini 2oz bags from Amazon, and with those, the bulk amount is more manageable.)

** Also, to make you feel good...I was at Ralphs shopping and one bag of 'Garden of Eaten' chips cost $5.39. I think it was jalapeno cheese, and that's all they had, but regardless, I felt so good that I got the same thing for about $1.25 a bag (yea Amazon had it on sale). Yippy :-)

** Chips were not stale, chipped or smashed on arrival, in case you're wondering. And expiration date (on my on sale ones) is in about 4 months.

Summary: Good coffee ... especially when you read the directions!
Text:
This is a delicious alternative to regular coffee. It has less caffeine and seems to be a bit easier on my achy joints. It brews smooth, rich and dark because of the chicory root.

There is no need to add additional coffee, as a one-star reviewer claimed. The directions instruct you to use fewer scoops of French Market chicory coffee than you would normally use for a pot of normal coffee. I use a french press (32 oz size), and two heaping tablespoons are enough to make a bold, smooth, and delicious brew with 5-7 minutes of steeping.

My Mini Poodle won't eat any dog treats. I have wasted hundreds of dollars. I bought this & she goes hog wild over it. I can't believe her.
I have ordered many other flavors of this brand. It is also very healthy & no by-products in it. Try it..your dog will love it.

I really like the plain pb2 flavor, so I figured chocolate will taste amazing because I'm a big fan of all things chocolate.  But PB2 really dissapointed.  This TASTES AWFUL. DO NOT BUY!! How can they charge so much money for such a terrible product????
Nescafe Taster's Choice Instant Coffee is as good if not better than the local coffee shops. Plus, Nescafe Taster's Choise cost less than 10 cents per cup. Ron Jones from Texas

I made some of this rice last night in my Zojirushi rice maker and it turned out fantastic! Tastes great with Chicken Marsala made with "Patak's Tikka Masala Curry Cooking Sauce" and has a higher level of nutrition than standard brown or white rice.
Really great tasting chips. I really did not expect them to be as hard as they were. Good if they are cover with a cheese sauce.

No flavor at all.  If you want watered down cofee then this is for you.  Despite making a "larger" cup all they due is push more water through the same amount  of coffee as their other products (almost too little as it is IMO).  I expected the discs to be larger with more coffee but unfortunatly that was not the case.  They just send more water through which ends up watering it down and then they have the nerve to label it as "medium".  I suppose if you want a mild coffee then this is the one for you, but not if you want something with even a shred of taste.  My only solution has been to swap the cup out about halfway through the process and dump the second half of it.  Otherwise it would have been a complete waste.

Summary: Taste good but won't order again
Text: Good price but this stuff is just too sweet for my liking. 80 calories a cup, 9 carbs, too much fat and sugar. The taste was good though so if you treat it more like a desert instead of an everyday morning coffee then you'll probably like it.

I bought a Jr Carousel gumball machine for my fiance's birthday, and with it 3 pounds of .6 inch sugar-free gumballs. The Jr Carousel Gumball machine is nice, but I am here to review the gumballs. They seem to be lacking in the flavor department, and are also pricey. Yes, they are very sweet, but they don't have very much in terms of actual flavor. All you get is the artificial sweetness. The intense taste does not last long, but this is true with all gumballs, sugar free or not. Most commercial gumballs are brightly colored and each color gumball has a different flavor; the surprise of getting a different flavor experience every time is part of the allure of putting quarters into the gumball machine. Not so with the Carousel Sugarfree gumballs: while the Carousel sugar free gumballs contain a variety of bright colors, I have yet to detect any difference in flavor between say a pink, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, or white gumball. No assorted fruits or mints, the only flavor present in these gumballs is simply the sugar-free sweet. While they do taste good, they lose their flavor quickly and get a little boring after a while.

Summary: Great for Senior Dogs/priced too high
Text:
My dog has always consumed and loved pedigree, but with age she had needed some additonal help. The Healthy Maturity formula has all the nutrition needed for healthy joints which has slowed her down lately. I think this dog food has helped her to get along better than before we started it. Since it is loaded with salmon/fish oil, it has a rather potent smell and has made the dog very 'gassy' if you know what I mean. Of course my kids think it is funnier than anything on TV.
As for the price $18.99, that is outrageous. You can get this for under $11 at Walmart and Kmart.

We have purchased this exact kit from amazon in the past. This kit was great,every function we went to we brought a bottle and it was a big hit. Everybody loved it. If you are new to wine making this kit has everything you need to make and bottle your wine, but you must have all of the associated supplies already example the bottles, carboy, hydrometer, and corker.

These snacks are great for kids.  My three year old is very picky, and he loves them.  They are easily portable, since the bag is resealable.  I like the fact that there are no additives, it's just fruit.  Highly recommend them to all.

Summary: The page says gallon, the jug says 66 oz 2 liter
Text: I'm confused by the label but have yet to try the oil to see if it's genuine or not.  I will update after trying it.

This product helped us tremendously. When our 2 year old daughter started day care, she wouldn't eat at the center and she began losing weight. We started her on Pediasure in the mornings as an insurance policy that she was getting enough nutrion. It worked great she stopped losing weight and actually started gaining :). She loves the taste, especially the strawberry flavor.

We were very excited to try these cookies, since the kids had already seen the commercials. Our daughter especially loves Chips Ahoy, especially the soft ones. My first impression when eating one of these new cookies -- besides how small each cookie seems compared to the picture -- was that they're kind of like chocolate fig newtons. My wife was not thrilled with the aftertaste, much the the "presentaste." These cookies are okay, but not outstanding enough to make us changes from the Chips Ahoy we already buy and enjoy.

Summary: DOUBLED IN PRICE WITHIN A COUPLE OF WEEKS
Text: The pretzels are tasty and convenient, but I can't give them a higher rating due to the extreme jump in price (nearly double the price it was a couple of weeks ago when I made the purchase-around $17). Due to this, I assume the previous great reviews are based on the former price. Now I can pick these up at my local Grocery for close to the same price per bag, which defeats the purchase of buying in bulk online.

This is the first coffee that I have purchased from Coffee Bean Direct and I have to say that I am very pleased.  I fresh grind my coffee and drink it straight black.  This coffee is smooth with a very pleasant flavor and without the slightest hint of bitterness. Far better than Starbucks house blend!

Okay -- so 6 months ago I gave up red meat and poultry for both health and environmental reasons. Then 3 months ago I upped my % of fresh foods daily to about 75%. And I'm buying organic dairy and veg/fruit. And baking my own hi-fiber bread with organic flour. And I've lost about 27lbs -- without much pain and suffering.

But I gotta tell you -- these little tiny dishes (which are NOT biodegradable, though the comparable cornstarch dishes are available...) which amount to about 6 small bites and still contain ingredients Betty Crocker should be ashamed to market to an already allergic, asthmatic, obese, and energy guzzling population --

well, they're actually good. Easy. Fast. Limited serving size. Better if you add about 1/2t of real cocoa powder (emphasize REAL -- like Dagoba organic which you can get online from World Wide Chocolate....)

If I were Queen, I'd just have Dagoba make these, use the cornstarch environmentally friendly bowls, and no nasty little preservatives and less than healthy fats.

Try these at your own peril. Betty Crocker should be shot.

I first discovered this sauce in the grocery store and decided to give it a try.  I am now addicted to it!  It's the only wing sauce that I LOVE.  Then one day, I noticed they were out of stock at the grocery store. Of course, I went into panic mode. But I sat back and knew that there are various grocery store chains in my area so I would look elsewhere.  I really freaked out when I couldn't find this sauce anywhere!  Thank goodness for Amazon!  I was able to find it here and order it by the 6 pack.  I treat this stuff like gold (only close friends and family are allowed to have any) and love it on just about anything.  When I have something with other wing sauces, it just doesn't compare.  If you haven't had it, you must give it a try. If you don't like it, send me the rest of your bottles!  (note: you have to get the HOT version--cleans your sinuses out!)

I LOVE Stash tea! My favorite is the fusion green and white tea though. I bought the box of tea cause it was a GREAT price for such a large quantity. I'm very happy with the purchase, and recommend trying Stash tea to anyone. I also LOVE doing business with Amazon cause they always have great low prices. I recommend Amazon.com to all as well.

The packaging for the Special K cereal is fantastic. You get your boxes in a nice tightly sealed plastic bound set. They are in air packaging and in a box that isn't too big nor too small.

The Special K is a great cereal to fill the hole and for a snack. With it's limited calories you don't feel like you're depriving yourself, rather than indulging in a really good cereal , a really good food. I sprinkle about a half teaspoon of sugar over it just to cut the tart of the strawberries. It fills you up and is better than a normal corn flake type cereal.
They came fresh and they were delicious. I will be ordering more when I am out! YUM YUM YUM. Love the ingredients first and foremost for no unnecessary crap!
These taste like roasted marshmallows/sweet potato casserole from Thanksgiving! They are awesome! My only issue w/ them is that I cannot stop eating them.
My French Bulldog put a hole in this in under an hour.  To be fair, she is a strong chewer.  So if your dog is a medium chewer, this might be okay.

Summary: not much, if any, chocolate flavor
Text:
After trying -- and liking -- the regular PB2 product, I decided to try this variety with "premium chocolate" added. Quite honestly, I have a hard time tasting the difference between this variety and the PB2 product without chocolate. Maybe I could discern the difference during a side by side comparison, but by itself this product doesn't really taste like chocolate at all. It just tastes like sweet peanut butter.

The only reason I'm giving it three stars is that it still tastes okay and I like this product generally -- a good way to get some peanut flavor without all the calories. But if you're looking for a chocolate/peanut product to replace your Reese's Peanut Butter Cup habit, this product isn't it.

I'm a Pediatric Nurse and we encourage the kids to eat healthy and promote good dental care. We do what's called a "Fluoride Varnish" treatment to the kids teeth from 9 months to 3yrs of age, and at times have to give vaccinations, and as a treat for their bravery, and to stay true to their dental care, I was looking for a candy that was sugar free and dye free but taste great as well, because everyone knows that kids are our best critics. So I Bought these yummy suckers and tried them out. They were a huge hit, as well as with the parents, that were diabetic, everyone wanted to know where I got them from. Most couldn't believe that there wasn't any sugar in them, and that this product was all natural. These are fabulous, I can't say enough about them. I have given the web address to so many who have asked about them. There's a lot that comes in the bag, more than I was expecting for the price, but I was very please, well worth it. Now I find myself hiding the suckers so the staff and parents won't eat them all. I am now a repeat customer

GOOD WORK YUMMYEARTH
I really enjoy this added to coffee for a mocha flavor.  Dissolves better than other fat free hot chocolate mixes.

Summary: Delicious but a bit too much chocolate
Text: These taste fantastic and as part of the lightning deal they are a great price.  Just a little too much chocolate, makes it feel like I am eating a bag of dark chocolate (which isn't bad) but makes it hard to taste the macadamia nuts.

Summary: Just like I remembered eating as a kid.
Text: The brand I remembered eating as a kid, allegedly changed their recipe. Surprisingly this product got it exactly right. The same flakey, crystal-like texture, and chocolatey flavor. I will be ordering again!
Great jerky.  Not too tough... nor too salty.  Just right.  And the 100-cal packs provide the perfect amount for a snack without the rest of the bag going bad.

I have a 4 year old 18 lb Shorkie and a 6 year old 35 lb Cockerpoo.  Both of them seem to really love these treats.  They are small enough that they love to catch them in their mouths! I can't speak for the taste since I don't eat them :-) but my 2 dogs seem to look forward to these little treats.  We have to watch their weight and these are the perfect size and don't seem to be adding the pounds.  As long as they get some little something they are happy.  We have to watch what we give our cockerpoo as she has a sensitive stomach but so far these don't seem to be upsetting her.

Summary: Great when mixed with Jasmine Pearl.
Text: This tea is excellent when mixed with Jasmine Pearls. It is my favorite tea ever!!

Summary: An Awesome Awesome Dry Food For Your Dog Without Worry About Any.
Text: It took for a week to waiting them to ship for the item but soooo pleased to myself and my dog :-) Thank you for the Newman's daughter to keeping an awesome company n' caring our pets!!!! 5 stars!

I am an older man , and many times my blood sugar levels have touched upon the outer edges of diabetes.  Therefore, I have tried to avoid actual white sugar with sugar substitutes.  Believe me I have tried them all!  Then one day a concerned "Health Nut" friend of mine gave me a bag of Ideal and I " fell in love!"  This is the absolute best-tasting, healthiest stuff and my sugar substitute for life!
They're good, but I think I prefer the Keebler version. The Keebler ones are very similar, but have a little more frosting.
Dr. Lucy has perfected the chocolate cookie. What more can I say. Scrumptious!! Perfect for kids (and adults) with allergies.
This was not as full bodied and rich as I had hoped for an espresso. Really only a medium roast level as well.
These Peeps are totally delicious! They really do taste like a light chocolate mousse. I wish they had them out in stores.
This is a Great drink. It is consistently delicious and the added lime is especially refreshing on a hot day. The plain is delicious as well.

This is my favorite noodle and I was so happy that I could find this in Amazon !
This noodle is just amazing ! you should try this.
One of the most expensive cereals on the market and difficult to find at times.  Great price at Amazon...about a 40% discount...good fiber content with a pleasant taste.

Summary: French Vanilla tea hard to find in stores but still delicious
Text:
Bigelow French Vanilla Tea and similar product by Lipton are almost impossible to find in Texas stores and in many other states surveyed on driving trips.

Amazon has an inexpensive way to obtain this product on a regular basis in packages of six boxes of 20 individually wrapped tea bags.

I have recently scheduled a shipment to automatically appear every six months.

Great service and great tea at a very good price.

Thanks Amazon

Summary: Great way to see which cups you like best
Text: When we initially bought our Vue, we bought two of these variety packs and I am glad we did. We eventually used all 25 (of each) cups but this pack is a great way to find out which flavors/varieties you like best without having to buy an entire 12+ pack only to find out you don't like it. Definitely the best starter pack.

Summary: FINALLY DELICIOUS PEANUT SAUCE WITHOUT THE GARBAGE INGREDIENTS!
Text: This sauce is incredible! I ordered both of the different sauces (peanut and satay) because of its all natural healthy ingredients. My boyfriend, (who happens to be thai) was hesitant to try it at first because he says he can never find a sauce that met his standards, UNTIL THIS!! One day I came home from work excited to have it over some fried tofu and vegetables, to find that HE HAD EATEN THE ENTIRE THING!! We are both truly loyal customers now - we absolutely love this sauce, it is great on salads, with meats, vegetables or tofu - it really adds an addictive flavor to any dish. Also, the shipping is fast and reliable, and I have found that the price is well worth-it compared to what else is out there (especially with the free shipping that is offered). If you want the real deal, you cannot beat Wan's sauce. I would recommend it to anyone.

Just received my bags of yellow split peas.  The bags are 14 oz. bags and NOT 16 oz. bags as advertised.  I needed exactly 32 oz. for my soup recipe and now I am short.  I am returning the item for a full credit. Will shop elsewhere.

This gum is not worth the money. There are far better Xylitol products out there for sale. This gum's taste lasts less than one minute before it is spent and tastes like an old shoe. Additionally, about the time that the flavor goes bad the gum turns to mush and does not even resemble gum at all.

Most Xylitol gums that I have tried to not last that long but this one by far is the quickest to go south.

I have had much better luck with others, you probably will as well.
This product is one of the special treats my yorkie loves. It also was shipped and received in a timely manner.

First time trying guayusa tea - just as described, smooth and stimulating.  Much easier on the stomach than coffee, no jitters (even though I drink 2-3 cups throughout the morning).  Delicious taste, too.  Even if I haven't slept well, the tea helps me feel energetic throughout the morning and afternoon.  Definitely lives up to its reputation.
I don't think I've ever eaten anything drier than these cookie bars, ever in my life. They taste okay, but I just can't choke them down, even with coffee.

Summary: Decent gum, but I don't like the hard-shell coating
Text: Don't know what it is, but the tell-tale crunch you get when you bite down on one of these little pieces of gum is annoying.  It's like Chicklets, but worse.  The gum does taste good after the preliminary crunching ends (10-15 seconds).  The pieces are small, and last a good 2-3 hours.  They do work well when you don't have time to brush after a meal or coffee (at work, school, etc).

We have been fans of Lindor Truffles for a number of years now.  The assortment is very good and it's hard to pick one that I like best.  I used them for Christmas gifts last year and they went over great.

Summary: Not too bittter. Not too Sweet.
Text: Scharffen Berger Bittersweet Dark Chocolate Bar, 70% Cacao is one of the better dark chocolates I've tried. It's not too bitter, and not too sweet. My normal preference is "semi-sweet" chocolate containing around 60% Cacao, but I enjoyed the 70% "bittersweet". It was just sweet enough for me. The chocolate is definitely better quality than the average mass market store shelf brands, and I recommend it.

My dogs love these treats and give me that head snapping approval when I give them to them. (You know that quick head snap when they love something and want more :-) This is the best price I have found so I always order them from Amazon. I use them for training treats since they are small, but flavorful and not fattening for my dogs.

Love it...Very very nice...Great flavor......One of my favorites for sure, although I do have quite a few favs I really like....Which is cool...Something awesome and different every cup I make....

I see some reviews talk about the kcups either arriving damaged or bursting open when used leaving grinds everywhere....I have yet to have 1 single kcup come apart during use....no grinds to clean..no grinds in cup...makes a great cup every brew...

Oddly, I have had a few issues with opening a new box in this 'type of packaging' with 50 kcups all loose in the box and finding 1 or 2 damaged with grinds in the box...no biggie at all...a 3 minute call to amzn and they ship you another box right away while letting you keep the original box (they should since it cant be re-sold and it does take time cleaning the grinds off the rest of the kcups)....but oddly, i've not had a problem with tullys italian getting damaged in this type of packaging.....

anyway, a really great coffee....wonderful flavor, perfect balance....drinking a cup right now.....

Summary: bonus of getting an old, finicky dog to eat
Text: My 15-year-old lab mix has big problems with her back legs and has been on Rimadyl and tramadol for years. I've been thinking that at her age why worry about her liver...but lately she has become very finicky about food. Keeping weight on her has become problematic. I received a trial size of this product from the hippie dog store in town. Hoo boy - she's been licking her plate clean. Too soon to tell how it might benefit her ancient joints, but I'm definitely going to order more if for no other reason than to get her to eat! I will be giving it to my 6-year-old shepherd/pit bull mix too.

I haven't had a cat yet that liked this one.  It's just a little too interesting for them I think.  It smells nasty but I think it's just the taste that really gets them.  My current cat just won't touch it - he might eat a couple of bites if he's REALLY hungry, but I always wind up throwing it out.  This one is ground so if your cat likes pieces, don't try this one.

Undoubtedly, the purchase and use of stool softeners would plummet if everyone, including physicians, considered magnesium.

Fact: An insufficient amount of magnesium in the body is a primary cause of constipation and hemorrhoids, yet most physicians unwittingly recommend stool softeners.

Fact: By taking your measure of Natural CALM daily your constipation will quickly subside.

Friends, before you devour any more medications why not try a natural remedy?

Natural CALM is an easy-to-assimilate powder that when mixed with water becomes effervescent. More effective and absorptive than tablet form, Natural CALM is the best selling ionic magnesium supplement to be found in health food stores to date. Choose natural or one of four flavored varieties. It's all the same healthful Natural CALM.

Magnesium is also attributed to curing or moderating all of the following conditions: leg cramps, headaches, hair loss, insomnia, high blood pressure, nervousness, muscular disorders and depression. That is not to say that any or all of these conditions are apt to be remedied in each and every case. Pardon me, but I had to laugh when reading one reviewer's comment that said the product helped her leg cramps but didn't do anything for her sleeplessness. She readily awarded the product a mediocre three stars.

Holistic alternatives are of utmost importance, especially--especially as we advance in years. I highly recommend this gluten-free product. You might be surprised at how little you require. Starting with half a teaspoon daily you increase or decrease as might be necessary. Soon you discover your proper dosage.

Directions are unclear as to the amount of water to be used: "Place powder in a glass or mug," it says. "Add 2-3 oz of hot water. Let it fizz, then stir until dissolved. Fill with warm or cold water and enjoy. You can also simply add Natural CALM to a glass or bottle of cold water."

Got it? Neither do I. It's confusing at best. Just how much water to how much powder? It seems that they leave this for us to decide.

Then there's the problem with this two-inch wide container. The size and shape may be suitable for stacking on store shelves, but not for home use. You need something wider. Consequently, I transfer the contents into something more sensible. Now I can utilize a measuring spoon, a measuring spoon for the sake of accuracy.

Consistent results are what we desire and consistent results require accurate measurements. My dosage being precisely half a teaspoon, I use water (at room temperature) in one measured cup. Directions advise us to heat the water, but I myself do not find that extra chore necessary. I stir and let it settle. Then down the hatch.

Need I mention that Natural CALM contains no yeast, dairy, egg, soy, wheat, sugar, starch, preservatives, artificial color or flavors? No fructose added. For further information call customer service at (866) 416-9216.

Take charge of your health. Live life to the fullest.

I like to add a little flavoring to my Columbian coffee, but I don't like anything overpowering. I have been using this for about a week and am very happy with this product.

I grind my own Columbian beans and then add a spoonful of Starbucks Vanilla Flavored Coffee to the ground beans. The result is a great tasting coffee with just a hint of flavor. I love it, and have gotten compliments. It will last a long time if you use this method.

I did not expect to like this (don't know what possessed me to buy it in the first place) but after preparing it for the first time, I realized it is absolutely amazing. It is even better when made using the "Back to Basics Coco-Latte" machine, because it creates a nice frothy top.

It is a little sweeter than I usually like my coffee, but I think of it more as a dessert beverage or a special treat, instead of my morning coffee, and it is perfect for that.

I highly recommend it to anyone who likes White Mochas, if they like them a little sweet. If you are expecting it to be exactly like a White Chocolate Mocha from that ubiquitous chain of coffee shops, you may be disappointed. But if you are looking for a delicious beverage to enjoy after dinner or on a cold afternoon, then you will love this.
Great realcoconut young coconut taste. Not the usual overwhelming sweet taste seen on other coconut water canned drinks.  Good on the environment. Made in Brazil. Even better.

Summary: Delicious healthier snack for the kids!
Text: My kids (3 years old and 17 months old) love these fruit snacks.  I love them because they are great on the go and while they are obviously no substitute for actual fruit, they are much better for the kids than other sweets like cookies or candy.  I have to admit that I love these snacks too, and at 70 calories per bag, they are great for satisfying my sweet cravings too!

I had eaten the DaVinci Spinich Nests years ago and then life moved on. Then I found a box half full and cooked it up and remembered when a wonderful product this is. But I could not find it in any of the four different market chains in my area. So thank goodness Amazon carried it. Unfortunately it only comes in a 12 pack, but hey, I'll use them eventually. I don't know why DaVinci is not sold everywhere, or at least the Spinich Nests. It's so easy to proportion it correctly since two nests seem to be just right per person. Of course more is always good too. I make my own red sauce with Turkey and crushed tomatos and all I can say is YUMMMY! If you have not tried this, don't waste another minute. I know I won't. Dinner anyone?

I like almost every tea I've ever tried (both bagged and loose), but this oolong tea was terrible. It actually tasted like dirt and I had to pour it out. This particular tea bag came in a box called "Teas of China and Japan Collection" with a variety of other teas. I haven't tried any of the others, and I'm not sure if I will.

Nice fresh beans, very well roasted. Great flavor, robust and balanced, smooth finish. Would have preferred more info on the bag about the beans than about Larry's attempts to be "green." Definitely a buy.

Summary: Used to help increase milk supply while breastfeeding. Did not work.
Text: I purchased this item because my OBGYN recommended it in order to help increase my milk supply while breastfeeding. She recommended taking the regular dose for 5 days to increase milk production. The capsules were easy to take and they had a pleasant smell, but they didn't help increase milk production after taking for 10 days straight.

Summary: Best espresso roast I have ever tasted!
Text:
After deciding to give up my 3 mocha a day Starbucks habit I wanted to try something new. First off, I had a question about this product so I emailed the company and got a very rapid response, excellent info and friendly reply. Awesome customer service!

Now as to the coffee itself... I feel like I have been missing out! I am an avid coffee/espresso drinker. This espresso ground is amazing! I am using it in my espresso machine and the shots are perfect. A strong rich flavor with ZERO bitterness. The grind is wonderful, almost as fine as flour, not grainy at all. I thought giving up Starbucks would be hard but I don't even want their coffee anymore after tasting this. Highly Recommend!!!
My kids love this soup and I love having a few on hand. It's a reliable meal with some toast and cheese. I often add tofu to it to bump up the protein and they never notice.

This is really a great product. When I start my day with the Cappucino Carmel and being out on my patio, it's having a little bit of heaven here on earth. Thank you Amazon for making it affordable for me

I purchased this cereal because I wanted to get something more natural for my children.  I'm tired of cereal box ingredients being unrecognizable garbage.  My children love the taste and have gotten tired of just plain cheerios being the only thing I will get for them from the grocery store.  I like that I can set this up to be delivered regularly and forget about it.  There also is minimal packaging that (not certain on this one) I believe is biodegradable.  I gave it only 4 stars because while it does taste very good there still is more sugar than I would like to see in it but I guess that is why the kids love it so much.  For taste only I suppose my kids would give it five stars.  My 15 year old daughter calls it "amazing" :o)

These are even better than Girl Scout cookies and most likely healthier.  If you are into weight watchers.  You may eat two of these absolutely delicious cookies for 3 points.  These are so satisfying.  After eating, two quickly put the box away, because you will want more.
This chicken was a gift and it arrived on time and was well liked. Fast service and good quality.

We have made friends recently with an abandoned tabby cat we call Mr. Whiskers. I am sure he would be grateful for most anything on a plate at this stage, still he appears to be a gentleman of discernment. And at first whiff of Petite Cuisine, he settled down to some serious feeding and joyously licked his whiskers afterwards.

This is an obviously high end cat food and looks and smells good enough for humans. (Let us hope in this economy it does not come to that.) As long as I can afford it I will continue feeding him this brand. I have seen pets fed cheap food develop terrible tumors on their poor little bodies, so I am committed to serving him the best I can find / afford.

Bottom line: if you care about your pet and can afford it I highly reccommend this brand. I was quite impressed by the quality.

Summary: All the taste and fewer calories!
Text: I heard about this product from Hungry Girl.  It is great to use as a lower calorie substitute for regular peanut butter in recipes.  I love to use it when I make a chocolate peanut butter milkshake using frozen yogurt, fat free chocolate syrup and some of this powdered PB...my oh my...it is delicious!  The product is 75% less fat and calories.  To be able to still have a taste of PB with so many fewer calories and a great taste...its awesome!  I can't wait to try this is other recipes!!

I bought this after purchasing coconut extract from the grocery store.  The store coconut extract didn't add any coconut flavor to my dish (coconut cupcakes or coconut bread pudding).  This product did the trick.  It adds a distinct coconut flavor and is delicious, but don't use too much - it can be powerful.  I use this product whenever I need to add a little coconut flavor.  The amount in the dram is small, enough for 2 uses, so I usually order 2 at a time.

I love giving these kits as gifts to my friends and clients. It's a great housewarming or hostess gift. Plus you support a great organization that employs and trains people with disabilities. It's a win-win! Prairie Spices Gift Set

This is a breakfast food that simply cannot be beat. Sure, I like my own homemade waffles better, but for a store-bought brand, this is really good. It tastes great with other things like peanut butter, jelly, or honey. It stays crunchy for a decent amount of time if you toast it long enough (but don't worry, it doesn't need THAT much toasting) Toasting amount of time for this product is really a personal choice. This also tastes great with just butter and syrup, though add eggs for a nicely-balanced meal with a glass of almond milk or healthy OJ.

Summary: Whether you call it Rooster Sauce or Thai Ketchup, it is a condiment you won't put down
Text:
Andrew Knowlton, restaurant editor at Bon Appétit magazine, predicts sriracha will be one of the biggest food trends of 2010!

Knowlton was a guest on the CBS Early Show and shared, "If you walk into any chef's kitchen or home, you will find sriarcha. Sriracha is a hot sauce with flavor -- it livens up every dish you put it on."

Once only found on Thai or Vietnamese restaurant tables, a bottle of Sriracha (sree-RAH-cha) Hot Chili Sauce is now a telltale sign of a great eatery, whether it is on a sidewalk hot dog stand, a family hamburger joint or my favorite Asian restaurant.

Last year, New York Journal News reporter Kara Newman provided some background about the condiment nicknamed "Thai ketchup." Here's an excerpt:

[[The two most commonly-found brands are Huy Fong, which sports a white rooster on the label, and Shark. (Supposedly, the shark is in homage to the shark-infested waters off the coast of Sriracha). Shark brand is made in Thailand and is used widely there as well as imported to U.S. stores and restaurants. Huy Fong is made in California by a Vietnamese immigrant, David Tran, and is the U.S. favorite.]]

Sriracha is made of sun ripened chilies that are ground into a smooth paste with garlic. The sauce is nearly as thick as ketchup, which makes the squeeze bottle a handy way to deliver a spicy kick to your favorite foods. Speaking of ketchup, a little sriracha can add a nice kick to ketchup or your favorite dipping sauce without overpowering the other ingredients.

Newman's story featured recipes were adapted from Greg Gilbert, Jackson & Wheeler.

Sriracha Remoulade

1 cup mayonnaise
1/4 cup sriracha
2 tablespoons red wine vinegar

Whisk together until smooth. Serve as a dipping sauce with fried calamari rings.

Fried Calamari

1/2 cup calamari
1 cup milk
1 cup flour
1/2 cup semolina
Vegetable oil for frying
Salt and pepper

Soak calamari rings in milk for about 20 minutes; drain.

In a bowl, combine the flour and semolina. Dredge the calamari in the flour mixture, and shake off the excess. Heat the oil to 350 degrees, and fry the calamari until golden brown. Season with salt and pepper and serve with Sriracha Remoulade.

Sriracha Spicy Buffalo Wings

6 chicken wings
Oil for frying
3 tablespoons Frank's Red Hot Sauce
1 tablespoons sriracha
1 tablespoons butter, softened
Baby mache or other lettuce to garnish

Fry the chicken wings until crispy. In a bowl, combine the red-hot sauce, sriracha, and butter. Toss the wings in the sauce and serve. Garnish with baby mache or other lettuce.

In summary, I grew up with pepper, salt and Tabasco pepper sauce on the table for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Did sriracha replace my bottle of Tabasco? Yes. Sriracha is hotter but with a light, sweet finish that sets it apart from the vinegar tang of other pepper sauces.

Rating: Five stars

Summary: the best instant out there for me
Text: I have to admit I'm a coffee snob, owning a semi-comm espresso machine at home and am heavily into all that coffee voodoo stuff.  Although I think Starbucks coffee is just so-so unless buried beneath lots of caramel and other stuff, I really like these VIA instants for some reason.  Maybe it has more a french press taste and experience than other instants that draws me to them, I don't know.  I do know that I will take these quick and easy to use instant packs over the cafeteria coffee any day.  Before folks get all on me about my contradictions, it's a personal taste thing.  I love apples, too, and eat tons of them, but hate applesauce.  The same goes with these things...I hate liking them, but I do.

This Vendor JustCaviar, has gone above and beyond any expectation of fullfilling my order. I placed this same order with another vendor and after a couple of days was told, they could not find the product. JustCaviar was given my order and they too could not fill it. I was sending a birthday present to a family member that I had never met, so this was important to me. JustCaviar called me at home, to say they WILL find my product and it WILL be sent to the recipient, and not to worry. Sure enough...JustCaviar is true to their word, and my package is on it's way to the recipient. In this day and age, to find such EXCELLENT service is unusual! JustCaviar has made a friend for life. All of my gourmet needs will be ordered from JustCaviar.
EXCELLENT...5 STARS. Thank you.

I have my Min-Pin boarded at the home of a friend who has what looks like a Westie. I took the bottle of "Lickety Stik" over when I went to pick up my dog. Offered it to both dogs. The westie loved it, however my Min-Pin would have nothing to do with it. Maybe that's because another dog licked it, however that's doubtful as most dog I've met aren't that fussy. Its kind of a cool idea but I think a dog biscuit works just as well. One other caveat, it looks like the same bottle that roll-on deodorant comes in so make sure you know for sure what you're smearing on your arm-pits or you could attract some unwanted attention

Summary: Good chips, Close to expiration date
Text:
These were good chips, but they were a month away from expiration (with no preservatives) when they arrived. I was expecting them to be good for longer considering it was a pack of 12 bags. I like chips, but not enough to eat 1.2 bags a day.

5* for the chips

1* for Amazon selling borderline stale chips

great sweetener.  i bake a lot and my husband is a diabetic so i decided to try this.  have made cookies and cheesecake so far.  both came out perfect.  highly recommend.  pricey, but worth it --- bag size is 1.28 lbs.
This is one of those movies that is a quirky classic, along the lines of Princess Bride or Willow. You never gat tired of watching it.

Summary: GREATEST SNACK FOR THE DIETARY RESTRICTED
Text:
Blue chips are the answer for anyone who loves their tasty, crunchy snack, but are restricted to salt content.
This product provides a very tasty answer.
NO SALT is the ultimate answer.

Happy John

Summary: San Francisco Bay for K-Cup Brewers
Text: With my Keurig brewer I try to keep the per-cup costs down by shopping around. When I saw the San Francisco Bay products I was intrigued, mostly because of price, but also concerned, as they are not sealed in a container (the bottom portion is a mesh). While I do need to keep the product in a sealed container for freshness, the coffee is good and the cost is right.

These cookies aren't like the traditional Fig Newtons/Fruit Newtonss I have bought in the past.  They look more like a thin cracker.  The cookies are also crunchy like a cracker, but definitely not as dry.  They are sweet but not too sweet, and very blueberry.  They remind me of the very top of a blueberry muffin, which is a good thing!  I'll definitely buy more of these for my family.
I received my order (van hotte flavored coffee) quickly and it was described accurately.  Thank you  Karen Van Den Berge

I've been cutting back on my salt intake and thought this product would be good, however, it contains soooo much black pepper (it's the first ingredient listed on the label).  I can not use much  to season my food because the black pepper is overwhelming and then the food is too spicy and bothers my stomach. I can not recommend this product.

These are a great value and are exactly what they claim to be: 1 dram borosilicate glass vials; not quite Pyrex but very heat resistant. I cannot stress enough to clean all of these vials (a tedious process) before using them. This should be done more thoroughly by the supplier. I would even pay a bit extra if they were pre-washed, rinsed, and dried. I learned the hard way on vial #1 and washed the other 11 immediately. I dropped one today on concrete from ~14" height and it did bounced with no cracks. I would buy this product again.

I was hesitant to order halvah long-distance instead of buying locally. So many times in my experience, I find that the product can be old and seriously dried out (it probably doesn't move very quickly here in the Midwest). But when I received this order from parthenonfoods.com, and immediately opened it, I was absolutely delighted at the product's FRESHNESS and deliciousness! I'll be ordering again soon from these folks. It's a pleasure to have found a vendor whose product quality I can trust. These folks deserve your attention! Check out Deli Fresh Marble Chocolate Halva, approx. 1lb. (Thanks, Parthenon Foods!)

If I was just judging these as gluten-free chocolate chip cookies I'd give them no more than 3 stars, but going against other mixes they are easy to make (even by children), and are relatively inexpensive, making them a 4 star product as long as people aren't comparing them to homemade.  They are slightly gritty from the rice flour and they don't hold together exceptionally well, plus they fall apart the next day.  But they do well when eaten partially frozen and actually make a decent cookie for a GF ice cream sandwich.  For slightly less spreading use Spectrum shortening instead of butter.

As with everything the past few years, these continue to get smaller.  Each bar is less than an ounce, "0.95 ounces" and to compare, one cherry tomato weighs an ounce average. (I remember when these types of bars first came out and they were six ounces each.)  Although the emphasis on the box is "granola" the ingredients list starts with "soluble corn fiber, rolled oats, isolated soy protein, sugar" and then some "cereal" described as "rice, whole grain wheat, sugar, wheat bran, soluble wheat fiber, salt, malt flavoring...).  Sugar, salt, and flavoring included as 'cereal?'  They do contain "hydrogenated and/or partially hydrogenated" vegetable oils.  Of the total 110 calories, 25 are from fat (7 grams of fat half of which is saturated fat...).  They have 17 grams of carbohydrates including 7 grams of sugar.  I found them to be quite sweet for a granola product.  The box photo shows what appears to be peanuts but I didn't find many peanuts in any of the five bars.  They do have a few mini chocolate chips on the top with a thin chocolate layer on bottom.  Nice idea but again, in my opinion, another marketing ploy on the public.  These things are not very healthy... an apple would provide as much or more nutritional boost for a snack and be much healthier.  There's no hint what the price is/will be, but these are not something I will be purchasing.  I'll head for the produce department instead.... and get more for my $$$.

Summary: NOT chocolate: FALSE LIST OF INGREDIENTS
Text: Extremely disappointed in this product. It barely tastes of cinnamon at all and is downright gross. My main complaint, however, is that it's not chocolate at all. It's a cake of sugar held together with dyed brown vegetable fat with a bit of cocoa liquor thrown in as an afterthought. Unbelievable that they market it as chocolate. And the list of ingredients on this product page conveniently leaves out the fact that it contains vegetable fat, which is clearly states on the package. It also does NOT contain cacao nibs, but rather cheap cacao liqueur. THIS PRODUCT CONTAINS TRANS FATS in the form of manteca/vegetable fat, also known as hydrogenated oil or Crisco. Don't let the legal loophole of "0 grams" fool you.

Summary: Best coffee candy you will find!
Text: I have tried all the coffee candies I could find on the internet, and these are simply the best!  A savory treat after meals or when on the road.  Love 'em.

Lady Grey is practically the only tea my family and I drink. First we bought it because of cornflowers, which are kinda a symbol of Russia, where I was born, but we stayed with it for the taste. Try it cold with lemon - it's amazing!

Summary: Good for a snack! (Not just for baby)
Text: I picked these up today and thought I would try them out for myself, since I don't have a baby.  They are pretty good, a lot of apple flavor with a nice texture.  I enjoyed them and plan to purchase more to use as a great snack.

Summary: Torani Sugar- Free Syrup in the Plastic Bottle
Text: Frankly, I was dissapointed.  I bought the same product in the glass bottle (smaller size) in my local grocery store and loved it.  Unfortunately (for reasons I do not know) this product had a slightly unpleasant chemically after-taste that the product in the glass bottle did not have.
Delicious. Would recommend to anyone who likes balsamic. Rich, creamy, sweet great on anything. My 3 year old niece calls it her sweet sauce and wants it on everything.
The smell of this cinnamon is incredible, and it says everything about its taste: hot, spicy, very cinnamon!!! As its a big jar, I gave some to my friends (I'm pastry chef) and they loved it to.

Summary: Perfect Blend of Fruit Flavors With the Right Amount of Tartness and Sweetness
Text:
This is the most awesome drink ever. I love bubbly drinks, but do not drink sodas due to the unhealthiness of them. I sometimes drink bubbly water as a treat. This drink is perfect. It is bubbly, but not unhealthy. It is 100% fruit juice. It is not sticky, but has just the right amount of sweetness and tanginess.

And the flavor is delectabale. It is the perfect blend of fruit juices. I love fresh watermelons, but when it comes to watermelon flavor, I don't like it to be very strong. That's why I love this drink - there is only a hint of watermelon flavor. The strawberry flavor is a little stronger. But all together, the flavors are a perfect blend. It can't get any better than this.

The cost on these has gone up since I first bought them some 12 years ago. Despite the cost, they are a good deal for anyone who can't eat wheat or gluten.  They taste delicious, and as several others have noted, are just as good, if not better than regular pretzels.  It's hard for me to find these even in the Twin Cities, so I will very happily be buying them through Amazon.  I have tried and used many Ener-G brand products over the years.  These are among the best.  I find their breads dry, tasteless, and unappealing in the extreme, but the pretzels  are awesome.  Other brands have an off taste, but not these.  They are wonderful and I will buy them frequently. Even my gluten eating family enjoys these, so I hide them!  They can eat their own.
They ARE the best little Scottie Dogs you'll ever eat.  I'm a huge licorice fan and these are phenomenal!
I really enjoy this tea.  Has the best flavor of any of the oolongs I have tried.  The leaves are whole and you do not get a lot of tea particles in your cup or pot.

Summary: Great product...good deal compare to stores
Text: I purchased the Dolce Gusto machine and my first few boxes at Bed Bath and Beyond.  signed up for the subscription and saved a lot. Each cup costs me roughly $1.06 but on amazon its only about 89 cents. These prices are certainly a lot cheaper than Starbucks. Why pay more if you can really save and have them shipped to your door? I love the subscribe & save program and i'm so glad these are a part of it! The chococino is basically a rich, frothy hot chocolate. It is always a hit when we have company over!

Mind you, I love Hormel products.. Their Microwave Bacon, for instance, is wonderful as is their Chilli and Beans (my favorite brand).. But wow, does this stuff ever need to be recalled and redone! I thought I was eating cardboard with a tasteless gravy poured over it! Really, really awful! Now I have five of these sitting on my shelf gathering dust.. I will probably end up donating them when my local food-bank comes around again.. Maybe someone else will like them.............but I doubt it...

Summary: Far more flavorful and sweeter than your standard cinnamon.
Text: If it were coffee or wine, the manufacturers would say something about it being full-bodied and talk about the various "notes" that make it superior to all others. And it would be true.

Summary: TASTES LIKE SUGAR.. BUT NOT 1ST OUT
Text:
Believe me when i say i HATE sweeteners that taste like sweeteners.
No Splenda
No Sweet and lo
No equal
UGHHHH

I took my chances and bought this,
put it in my green tea and i kid you not when I say there is NO AFTER TASTE and if you have tried sweeteners you know exactly what im talking about. It ALMOST tastes like sugar. Nectresse wasn't the 1st sweetener to use monk fruit its called lo han, just the first to be widely sold.

But never the less Great taste

Summary: One of my favorite coffees ever!
Text: I am relatively new to the world of pod coffee, but bought a Bunn My Cafe that I am thrilled with because it brews at the right temperature, easily, and with no ecological waste.  One of the fun aspects of all this is trying out all sorts of coffee pods made by different companies.  Most of what I have tried so far are very good, so I have no complaints about any of them, but the Marley One Love coffee pod is perhaps my new favorite.  Wonderfully smooth coffee from Ethiopia, and from the moment you open the wrapper and smell the first whiff of heavenly coffee until you get to drink the freshly brewed cup you will not be disappointed.  This is going to become a regular order for me.  YUM!
This is a great price on coffee and I don't have to run to the store when I need it! As always service is great!

I use this as a skin moisturizer and love the way it feels and smells! Does a good job keeping my hands moisturized. Need to reapply a couple times throughout the day, but it's worth the tradeoff that it's all natural without any weird chemicals, unlike the lotions you find the the personal care section.

For those that care: this comes in a plastic jar, not glass. Since I use it topically, I don't care that much. But if I was eating it, there are other organic coconut oils out there that come in glass containers.
These taste terrific and my grandkids call them candy bars and consider them a special treat!  They prefer the chocolate chip - I love the dark chocolate almond!

I found this curry sauce kit to be really tasty and able to create a large amount of sauce from one kit.

Instead of using the recommended beef I used oven roasted chicken thighs and about 3 lbs of sauteed vegetables. My veggie mix consisted of yellow onion, cauliflower, broccoli, pasilla chile peppers, and jalepeno peppers. All cut into 1" - 1.5" pieces except for the chiles which were sliced into 0.25" rings.

I roasted the chicken and removed the skin. I then sauteed the veggies in a large wok with some olive oil. Once the veggies were near done I added the large bag of Rendang curry sauce, the packet of dried coconut milk powder, and a cup of water. The sauce mixed with the ingredients well and when all the veggies were thoroughly coated I added the chicken thighs and gently mixed to coated them as well. Although I did not have rice on my plates there would have been enough sauce to drizzle on the rice without the sauce being watery. A pasta would have worked well in place of rice.

The sauce came out very flavorful without overwhelming the the vegetables or chicken. The coconut powder -- of which I had some reservations -- added a rich coconut flavor without any chemical or chalkiness.

This curry sauce kit made a delicious curry stir-fry dinner last night that was good enough to have again for lunch today. I would certainly buy this curry kit in the future.
I found this at Costco today for 6.59. Seriously irritated. I payed 3 times that...pfft.I guess I need to start checking around a bit more.
